entities.name: harry
entities.description: The protagonist, a young man with golden hair, is described as sitting on a window ledge and later found sprawled on the ground. He is also referred to by name in the text.

entities.name: gregorovitch
entities.description: Gregorovitch is described as having a stricken face with terror, and is referred to as 'the thief' by an unknown voice. He is also the one who asks Harry if he knows who the thief was.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as having bushy hair and is seen by Harry when he wakes up. She is referred to by name in the text.

relationships.description: Harry is questioned by Gregorovitch about who the thief was. This relationship is described in the text when Gregorovitch says 'Who was the thief, Gregorovitch?'

Harry sees Hermione when he wakes up. This relationship is described in the text when it says 'He looked up at Hermione, whose bushy hair obscured the tiny patch of sky visible through the dark branches high above them.'
